title: Ticket #7114: Design document for a read-only REST interface to HTCondor
description:
The goal of this ticket is a design document that covers the REST interface we want (URL hierarchy, inputs/outputs, nouns/verbs) for a read-only queries to the schedd and collector.

This design document will be done in collaboration with Boris at KBase, and Greg T with HTCondor.

Once it comes to implementing the design document (prolly via Flask), we will make a child ticket with development milestones and dates.
